spanGrp.span: I cut it there in Masu
in komnzo they call it this
kom.nzo zo.kwa.si.me ʔa.ne fof thrä.ko.rəth za.ne zəf
that is what they say it in komnzo. this right here,
they sorcerers will not get you
they will not aim at you
this thing will protect you here
bə.than wo.ga.nə nza.wä.re.zə.rəth ra.fa ra.fa mon.me
the sorcerer tries to shoot at you ... from anywhere
ke kwa du.nzi krath.tha.kwə.rəth bə.than wo.ga.na.ne du.nzi
the arrow will not kill you. the sorcerer's arrow
ni.ma.ma za.ne zəf ya.ren e# ʔe.mith.gər
these ones here are hanging on the bags for this reason
ʔo mə.ren zə.bo fə.thə zə gə.nar.zaf.thə.grə
speaker in the background (RNA) points out how you can wear it around your neck
if you have it tied on your neck
didi = type of necklace; (RNA) in the back says "didithatha" first and then re repeats her words
it will hang around (your neck) like this
na.fa.ne sə.to.rəy ni.ma.me za.ne zəf rä
that is this the story about this one
